title: What are your thoughts on "THE VACCINE WAR" trailer?
selftext:
[TRAILER LINK](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sFfzp5bqr10)

After making movies like chocolate, hate story and zid, almost all of them which didn't work at the box office. Is he just trying to churn people's money with political and deshbhakti propaganda ?
comments:
Not giving a single view to Hatred Spreader.

If I have to ever watch it, I’ll Telegram it
A vaccine war which doesn't mention we only got the vaccine because Central government lost the case in Supreme Court is just a big lie

I think he is the biggest hypocrite in Btown,   
( A deshbhakt who has case of molestation from Tanushree Dutta )
